ips

Class IPv6

  • java.lang.Object
    • ips.IP
      • ips.IPv6

  • public class IPv6
extends IP
    See Also:
    Handles v6 IP's behaviour.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class ips.IP

        divisionSize, totalSize, values

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IPv6()
      Class constructor that has defined number of subdivisions and Subdivision length by default.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IPv6 AND(IPv6 ip)
      Does a binary AND between the IPv6 that calls the method and another IPv6 object.
      IPv6 AND(java.lang.String hexIP)
      Does a binary AND between the IPv6 that calls the method and a IPv6 hex string.
      static IPv6 ipInputBinary(java.lang.String binaryIPv6)
      Enables the user to input a binary v6 IP string separated with whitespaces and get a IPv6 object.
      static IPv6 ipInputDecimal(java.lang.String decimalIPv6)
      Enables the user to input a decimal v6 IP string separated with '.' and get a IPv6 object.
      static IPv6 ipInputHex(java.lang.String hexIPv6)
      Enables the user to input a hex v4 IP string separated with ':' and get a IPv4 object.
      IPv6 mainNetwork(int maskBitsNum)
      Gets the main network IP which the IPv6 that calls the method belongs to using a netmask represented by the number of bits that are unchanged on the IP.
      IPv6 OR(IPv6 ip)
      Does a binary OR between the IPv6 that calls the method and another IPv6 object.
      IPv6 OR(java.lang.String hexIP)
      Does a binary OR between the IPv6 that calls the method and a IPv6 hex string.
      java.lang.String showHex()
      Converts a IPv6 to a hex string.

      • mainNetwork

        public IPv6 mainNetwork(int maskBitsNum)
        Gets the main network IP which the IPv6 that calls the method belongs to using a netmask represented by the number of bits that are unchanged on the IP.
